body:
I have seen so many topics being locked for being personal updates etc... and figured avicus forumers need some way of saying them without being moderated. So just post your twitter on this thread and we can follow each other!

My twitter - www.twitter.com/KooDaLord
body_tagged:
I have seen so many topics being locked for being personal updates etc... and figured avicus forumers need some way of saying them without being moderated. So just post your twitter on this thread and we can follow each other!

My twitter - www.twitter.com/KooDaLord
title: Twitter for personal update etc...

i don't have a twitter but may get one for this

replies.body: KooDaLord, I see you like building. Check out Keralis' youtube channel if you haven't already! Nice builds by the way and great idea!

replies.body:
The reason that they are locked or archived is probably because they have nothing to do with the Server. I understand if you want to update your friends on how your life is going etc, but the Avicus Forums isn't really the place for personal updates!

I like the twitter idea though :)
replies.body_tagged:

I like the twitter idea though :)
